title: Aptech rolls out AI degree programme
description:
Aptech partners with India’s SGSU to offer an affordable 36-month Aptech AI degree in Nigeria, aiming to close the country’s tech skills gap.

Read More: https://punchng.com/aptech-rolls-out-ai-degree-programme/
content: Aptech, one of Nigerias oldest IT training institutions, has partnered with Indias Scope Global Skills University to introduce an affordable 36-month Bachelor of Vocation degree in Information Techno… [+2541 chars]
